chapters.title: Chapter 13:  Siege
chapters.info:
Captain Charlz Guybon,
      p. 319â€”Guardsman-Lieutenant, now promoted to Captain, in the Queen's
      Guards in Caemlyn.  He hunted around for guards who were dismissed by
      Gaebril, finding over four thousand of them.
      Elayne promoted him to Captain because of his
      efforts, much to his embarrassment.  He is handsome with greenish hazel
      eyes with a face suited to smiling.
